meanings: 여전하다 remain unchanged, be as before, be as used to be, be just as it was.

meanings.meaning: it remains an unsettled question whether...or...

examples.korean: Factory Slowdowns U.S. manufacturers posted a smaller-than-expected increase in business last month, a sign factories are still mired in a slowdown, while consumer confidence in the economy weakened. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 제조업 침체 여전 지난달 美 제조업체들은 예상보다 낮은 생산량 증가를 보였는데, 이는 제조 공장들이 여전히 침체 국면에서 헤어나지 못하고 있음을 나타낸 것이며, 한편 경기에 대한 소비자 기대치는 낮아졌다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Factory Slowdowns U.S. manufacturers posted a smaller-than-expected increase in business last month, a sign factories are still mired in a slowdown, while consumer confidence in the economy weakened. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The Bush administration is watching the political unrest in Nepal with growing concern, and is trying to increase the pressure on King Gyanendra to lift the state of emergency he imposed more than a year ago and engage with the democratic opposition. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 부쉬 미국 행정부는 최근 네팔에서 벌어지고 있는 정국 불안 사태를 우려속에 주시하고 있습니다. 부쉬 행정부는 또한 갸넨드라 국왕이 일년여전 내린 국가 비상사태를 해제하고 민주 야당과 화합하도록 압력의 강도를 높이고 있습니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The Bush administration is watching the political unrest in Nepal with growing concern, and is trying to increase the pressure on King Gyanendra to lift the state of emergency he imposed more than a year ago and engage with the democratic opposition. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Defense Secretary Donald H. Rumsfeld visited Seoul to attend the 37th Security Consultative Meeting intended to assess the U.S.-South Korea military alliance, and to talk about the issue of the redeployment of 12,500 U.S. troops from South Korea and the relocation of Yongsan Garrison Seoul. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 미 국방부장관 도널드 럼스펠드가 제37회 한미군사동맹 을 평가하는 것을 의도하는 한미안보협의회에 참석하여 한 국의 12,500명 미군 이동과 서울 용산 기지 이전 문제를 논의하기 위해 한국을 방문했다. 양국이 한국내에 미군의 존재 지속의 필요성에 동의했 지만 철수하기로 된 12,500명의 미군 중 8,000명이 여전 히 올 연말까지 한국을 떠나기로 예정되었다. Neungyule
examples.english: Defense Secretary Donald H. Rumsfeld visited Seoul to attend the 37th Security Consultative Meeting intended to assess the U.S.-South Korea military alliance, and to talk about the issue of the redeployment of 12,500 U.S. troops from South Korea and the relocation of Yongsan Garrison Seoul. Add to Wordbook
